game.name: ARCHWIZARD
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fast paced "Hyper Shooter" complemented with esoteric exploration experience. Take a quest to become Arch Wizard: dominate surrounding realms, reverse Time, escape Death, befriend Chaos, face the End of the World. Knowledge based progression. High scores. Full of secrets.
